DOC.detailed_description: This phase 1 , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , single multiple oral dose study healthy Caucasian Japanese male participant . The study compose three part , Single-dose Ascending Part , Food Effect Part Multiple-dose Ascending Part . Single-dose Ascending Part Multiple-dose Ascending Part design randomize , double-blind open-label , placebo-controlled , sequential-cohort , ascend single multiple oral dose study TAK-114 match placebo . The Food Effect Part design randomize , open-label , 2-period crossover study single dose TAK-114 .
